name: NQ (Natural Questions)
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A benchmark dataset of real anonymized Google search queries paired with Wikipedia articles and human-annotated answers.
size: 307,373 training examples; 7,830 development examples; 7,842 test examples.
notes: Each example includes a Google search query and a corresponding Wikipedia page. Annotators provide a long answer (a paragraph or table) and, if present, a short answer (one or more entities or a 'yes'/'no' response). The dataset is designed to evaluate open-domain question answering systems and reading comprehension models.
